textAfterTable: Business Service 4   The room was comfortable and great location. the concern was it was a bit tired and the shower did not stay up on the shower holder. The bathroom could have been cleaned a bit better. The service was alright but did not appear that interested. Would you recommend this hotel: Yes I recommend this hotel for: Young singles Date of stay: July 2013 Paula Grooby - Upper Riccarton 23-07-2013 8.2 / 10 Value 8 Rooms 8 Location 10 Cleanliness 8 Check In / Front Desk 8 Service 7   The room was good and spacious for a large family, but we had the 12th floor with no fly screens on windows, no oven door, toasters didnt work very well, but other than that is was OK Would you recommend this hotel: Yes I recommend this hotel for: Families, Families with teenagers, Business conference, Young singles, Couples I do not recommend this hotel for: Families with young children Date of stay: April 2013 Rhonda Grady - Trundle 03-05-2013 8.0 / 10 Value
